Collaboration

Did you know Burning Flame Candle Company specializes in Custom Candle Manufacturing. Providing the ultimate candle and marketing experience for your home, events and businesses. Have you always dreamt of having a custom candle, with or without fragrance, in your brand's image?

Our candles are all handcrafted in Halifax, Nova Scotia using eco-friendly, 100% soy wax. Clean burning with no phthalates or parabens using only top quality materials and ingredients. We offer fully customizable branded candles from concept to production.

Our products make perfect gifts for customers and clients. Our products are perfect for weddings, corporate and client gifts, homes, promotional items, celebrations, party favours, memorial services, fundraising, employee thank you's, holiday gifts, Realtors + closing gifts, and more.

Interested in chatting more about customs?

Email: Lauren at info@burningflame.ca
